description: These chicken and jalapeno quesadillas have plenty of veggies inside to make for a healthier Mexican treat.
name: Chicken & Jalapeno Quesadillas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g chicken breast, lean, chopped into cubes
2 large capsicums, red and green, diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half oil in a large pan on medium high heat and fry chicken, diced onion, capsicums for 5-6 minutes. Add the kale, garlic, spices, cherry tomatoes, jalapenos and lime juice cook for 3-4 minutes.

Sprinkle cheese over half of each of the tortillas, top with the vegetable mix and fold over, pressing down to evenly disperse the filling. large pan (large enough to fit the tortillas) on medium high heat.
Add the remaining oil to large pan on medium heat and cook the quesadillas in 2 batches for 2-3 minutes on each side or until the cheese is bubbling.
Slice each quesadilla into 4 and serve with salad and whatever toppings you like.
